briefdescription.para: Monitors the temperatures of various points in the tractive system, and activates various cooling systems and such accordingly.

detaileddescription.para: Atm, this is mostly serving as an example of a task

inbodydescription.para: These here lines set the delay. This task executes exactly at the period specified, regardless of how long the task execution actually takes
This is an example of a task control point, which is the spot in the task where the task decides what needs to be done, based on the commands it has received from the task manager and the SCD
